resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82030</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82030</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4559</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Recycling</string>
            <string language="es">Reciclado</string>
            <string language="ga">Athchúrsáil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wiederverwertung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réutilisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recycling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riciclaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανακύκλωση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan that looks at conservation and reducing the amount of waste by recycling paper, glass, clothes and cans. Includes a survey activity on classroom waste.</string>
            <string language="es">Plan de lección que se ocupa de la conservación y la reducción de la cantidad de basura mediante el reciclado de papel, vidrio, ropas y latas. Incluye una actividad de estudio sobre la basura de la clase.</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean ceachta a fhéachann ar chaomhnú agus méid na drámhaíle a lagdú trí páipéar, gloine, éadaí agus cannaí a athchúrsáil. Áirítear suirbhé ranga ar dhrámhaíl ranga leis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Environmental Care</string>
            <string language="es">Cuidados medioambientales. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Cúram Timpeallachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan, der Erhaltung und das Verringern der
Menge der Vergeudung betrachtet, indem es Papier, Glas, Kleidung und 
Dosen aufbereitet. Schließt eine Übersicht Aktivität auf 
Klassenzimmervergeudung ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon qui regarde l'économie et 
réduire la quantité de perte en réutilisant le papier, le verre, 
les vêtements et les bidons. Inclut une activité d'étude sur 
la perte de salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição que olha o conservation e 
reduzir a quantidade de desperdício recycling o papel, o vidro, a 
roupa e as latas. Inclui uma atividade do exame no desperdício 
da sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione che guarda la conservazione 
e la riduzione della quantità di spreco riciclando la carta, il 
vetro, i vestiti e le latte. Include un'attività di indagine 
sullo spreco dell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος που εξετάζει τη συντήρηση και μείωση
του ποσού αποβλήτων με την ανακύκλωση του εγγράφου, του γυαλιού, 
των ενδυμάτων και των δοχείων. Περιλαμβάνει μια 
δραστηριότητα ερευνών στα απόβλητα τάξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimaobacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soin Environnemental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cuidado Ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cura Ambientale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιβαλλοντική προσοχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
